last_episode_to_air.name: Josef Mengele
last_episode_to_air.overview: What happens when a state sanctions the evil acts of a twisted mind belonging to a man who everyone addresses as doctor? This is the story of one such man, Josef Mengele, also known as The Angel of Death.

name: Murderous Minds: Inside Serial Killers
overview: Regarding criminality, not many genres inspire as much horror and revulsion as that of a serial killer. A predator in the most savage form. A beastly figure usually preying on the weak, innocent and vulnerable. Deeply-embedded negative and sometimes horrific experiences are the usual catalysts for their reign of terror. Take a look inside these murderous minds.
